categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Thaereian system was a Expansion Region star system centered around a dying yellow star, near the Cularin system. Planets in the system included Odae Ripp, Thaere Privo, Zham Hlar.
Over Thaere originally described the system as possessing three planets. However, one of Thaere Privo's moons, T-4, was mistakenly labeled as the fourth planet in the system by Trade and Trade Alike.
